text: Dangshi, emo yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen shuo:“Jintian [bai de'er zhanyi zhi ri], jue meiyou ren neng zhansheng nimen, yinwei wo shi nimen de baohu zhe.” Dan dang liang jun zaoyu shi, ta you tuique shuo:“Wo jue buneng tong nimen yiqi gongshi, wo dique neng kanjian nimen suo kan bujian de, wo dique weiju an la. An la shi chengfa yanli de.”
